name: UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext
desc: The drawing environment for a PDF renderer.

items.name: func beginPage()
items.desc: Marks the beginning of a new page in the PDF context and configures it using default values.

items.name: func beginPage(withBounds: CGRect, pageInfo: [String : Any])
items.desc: Marks the beginning of a new page in the PDF context and configures it using the specified values.

items.name: var pdfContextBounds: CGRect
items.desc: The bounds of the PDF context for the current page.

items.name: func addDestination(withName: String, at: CGPoint)
items.desc: Creates a named destination point in the current PDF page.

items.name: func setDestinationWithName(String, for: CGRect)
items.desc: Creates a link rectangle in the current page that when clicked, will jump the PDF viewer to the named destination.

items.name: func setURL(URL, for: CGRect)
items.desc: Creates a link to an external resource defined by a URL
